RoomRedesign.title: Transform Your Space with AI
RoomRedesign.subtitle: Upload a photo of your room and let our AI reimagine it in any style you choose. See stunning before-and-after comparisons in minutes!
RoomRedesign.uploadDragText: Drag and drop your image here, or
RoomRedesign.additionalPromptPlaceholder: E.g., Add more plants, use warm colors, include a fireplace...
RoomRedesign.emailNote: We'll send you a secure link to view your before & after comparison
RoomRedesign.howItWorksText: Upload your photo → Our AI generates a redesign (2-5 min) → Check your email for a secure link → View your interactive before/after comparison!
RoomRedesign.successMessage: Our AI is creating your room transformation. This usually takes 2-5 minutes.
RoomRedesign.successEmailText: for a link to view your results.
RoomRedesign.errorFileType: Please select an image file (JPEG, PNG, WebP)
RoomRedesign.errorFileSize: File size must be less than 10MB
RoomRedesign.errorNetwork: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.

RoomRedesignView.title: Your AI-Powered Room Transformation
RoomRedesignView.subtitle: Drag the slider to compare before and after
RoomRedesignView.errorInvalid: Invalid access link. Please check your email for the correct link.
RoomRedesignView.errorExpired: This link has expired. Links are valid for 24 hours only.
RoomRedesignView.errorProcessing: Your redesign is still being processed. Please check again in a few minutes.
RoomRedesignView.errorFailed: AI generation failed. Please try uploading your image again.
RoomRedesignView.errorLoadFailed: Failed to load redesign. Please try again later.

values.sectionSubtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for perfection in every project, ensuring the highest quality in design and execution.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We embrace new ideas and technologies to create cutting-edge, forward-thinking designs.

passion.title: Passion
passion.description: Our love for design drives us to exceed expectations and create spaces that inspire.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We build trust through transparency, honesty, and ethical business practices.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To transform spaces into exceptional environments that enhance the lives of our clients through innovative design, meticulous craftsmanship, and unwavering commitment to excellence.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading interior design firm in the Middle East, renowned for creating timeless spaces that blend cultural heritage with contemporary innovation.

cta.title: Work With Us
cta.subtitle: Ready to collaborate with our talented team on your next project?
